segments.text: What do you think of your personality ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am quite alive and energetic . I am a curious person , and I like to learn new things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am quite outgoing , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you get along with people whose characters are different from your own ?
segments.speaker: S1
